/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the otherwise still image. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the typical urban landscape of Beijing.
